targets.sql: select last(first_ep) as first_ep from $database.taosd_cluster_basic where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select last(cluster_version) as version from $database.taosd_cluster_basic where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

select case when grants_expire_time > (50 * 365 * 24 * 3600) then cast ('unlimited' as binary(100)) else grants_expire_time end as grants_expire_time from (select last(grants_expire_time) as grants_expire_time from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to)
select max(grants_timeseries_used) as used ,max(grants_timeseries_total) as total from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)
select last(dbs_total) from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(stbs_total + tbs_total) from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select connections_total from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select dnodes_total as total, dnodes_alive as dnodes_alive from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select mnodes_total as total, mnodes_alive as mnodes_alive from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select vgroups_total as total, vgroups_alive as vgroups_alive from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select vnodes_total as total, vnodes_alive as vnodes_alive from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

select `user`, app, client_ip, count(*) as connection_count from (select *, substring_index(end_point, ':', 1) as client_ip, substring_index(end_point, ':', -1) as client_port from performance_schema.perf_connections) partition by `user`,`app`,`client_ip`
select _wstart as ts, avg(dnodes_alive)/avg(dnodes_total) from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(mnodes_alive)/avg(mnodes_total) from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(vgroups_alive)/avg(vgroups_total) from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(vnodes_alive)/avg(vnodes_total) from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(grants_timeseries_used)/avg(grants_timeseries_total) as percent from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(grants_timeseries_used) as used , avg(grants_timeseries_total) as total from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select dnode_ep,  last(`status`) as status from $database.taosd_dnodes_status where _ts = '$last_dnodes_ts' group by dnode_ep order by dnode_ep
select _wstart as ts, max(dnodes_total) as total, max(dnodes_alive) as dnodes_alive from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select mnode_ep, last(role) as role from $database.taosd_mnodes_info where _ts = '$last_mnodes_ts' group by mnode_ep order by mnode_ep
select _wstart as ts, max(mnodes_total) as total, max(mnodes_alive) as mnodes_alive from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts,  sum(`count`)/($interval/1s) as `select_count`  from $database.taos_sql_req where sql_type = 'select' and ('$username' = '' OR username in (${username:sqlstring})) and  ('$sql_result' = '' OR result in (${sql_result:sqlstring}))  and _ts > $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, sum(`count`)/($interval/1s) as `delete_count`  from $database.taos_sql_req where sql_type = 'delete' and ('$username' = '' OR username in (${username:sqlstring})) and  ('$sql_result' = '' OR result in (${sql_result:sqlstring}))  and _ts > $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts,  sum(`count`)/($interval/1s) as `insert_count`  from $database.taos_sql_req where sql_type = 'insert' and ('$username' = '' OR username in (${username:sqlstring})) and  ('$sql_result' = '' OR result in (${sql_result:sqlstring}))  and _ts > $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, sum(`count`)/($interval/1s) as `inserted_rows`  from $database.taosd_sql_req where sql_type = 'inserted_rows' and   ('$fqdn' = '' or  dnode_ep in (${fqdn:sqlstring})) and ('$username' = '' OR username in (${username:sqlstring})) and  ('$sql_result' = '' OR result in (${sql_result:sqlstring}))  and _ts > $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, sum(`count`)/($interval/1s) as `count`  from $database.taos_slow_sql where ('$username' = '' OR username in (${username:sqlstring})) and  ('$sql_result' = '' OR result in (${sql_result:sqlstring})) and  ('$duration' = '' OR `duration` in (${duration:sqlstring})) and _ts > $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(VALUE, 0)
select last(stbs_total) from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select _wstart as ts, last(tbs_total) as tables_num from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, vgroup_id, max(tables_num) as tables_num from $database.taosd_vgroups_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by vgroup_id interval($interval) fill(null) order by vgroup_id
select last(tbs_total) as tbs_total from $database.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(uptime) as uptime from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(has_mnode) as has_mnode from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(cpu_cores) as cpu_cores from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(vnodes_num) as vnodes_num from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(masters) as masters from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(cpu_engine) from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(mem_engine) as taosd, last(mem_total) as total from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

select max(percent) as percent from (select data_dir_level, data_dir_name,last(used/total) as percent from $database.taosd_dnodes_data_dirs where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by data_dir_level, data_dir_name)
select timetruncate(first(_ts), 1h),  dnode_id, last(cpu_system) as cpu_use from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= (now- 5m) and _ts < now partition by dnode_id

select _wstart as ts, last(mem_engine) as taosd, last(mem_free) as `free`, last(mem_total) as total from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, data_dir_level, data_dir_name, last(used) as used from $database.taosd_dnodes_data_dirs where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by data_dir_level, data_dir_name interval($interval) fill(null) order by data_dir_level, data_dir_name

select _wstart as ts, data_dir_level, data_dir_name, last(total) as total from $database.taosd_dnodes_data_dirs where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by data_dir_level, data_dir_name interval($interval) fill(null) order by data_dir_level, data_dir_name

select _wstart as ts, avg(io_read_disk) as taosd_io_read, avg(io_write_disk) as taosd_io_write from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, 0 - avg(system_net_in) as system_net_in, avg(system_net_out) as system_net_out from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select sum(`total`) as `Total`, sum(`success`) as `Successful`, sum(`fail`) as `Failed`, sum(`query`) as `Queries`, sum(`write`) as `Writes`, sum(`other`) as `Other` from $database.adapter_requests where req_type=0 and ts >= $from and ts <= $to

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query`)/($interval/1s) as `query` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query_success`)/($interval/1s) as `query_success` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query_fail`)/($interval/1s) as `query_fail` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query_in_process`)/($interval/1s) as `query_in_process` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write`)/($interval/1s) as `write` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write_success`)/($interval/1s) as `write_success` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write_fail`)/($interval/1s) as `write_fail` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write_in_process`)/($interval/1s) as `write_in_process` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`other`)/($interval/1s) as `other` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`other_success`)/($interval/1s) as `other_success` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`other_fail`)/($interval/1s) as `other_fail` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 0  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select sum(`total`) as `Total`, sum(`success`) as `Successful`, sum(`fail`) as `Failed`, sum(`query`) as `Queries`, sum(`write`) as `Writes`, sum(`other`) as `Other` from $database.adapter_requests where req_type=1 and ts >= $from and ts <= $to

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query`)/($interval/1s) as `query` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query_success`)/($interval/1s) as `query_success` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query_fail`)/($interval/1s) as `query_fail` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`query_in_process`)/($interval/1s) as `query_in_process` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write`)/($interval/1s) as `write` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write_success`)/($interval/1s) as `write_success` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write_fail`)/($interval/1s) as `write_fail` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`write_in_process`)/($interval/1s) as `write_in_process` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`other`)/($interval/1s) as `other` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`other_success`)/($interval/1s) as `other_success` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, endpoint, sum(`other_fail`)/($interval/1s) as `other_fail` from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to and req_type = 1  and ('$adapter_endpoint' = '' or  endpoint in (${adapter_endpoint:sqlstring})) partition by endpoint interval($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: There are nodes offline in the cluster
alert.name: DNodes offline alert

targets.sql: select now(),  cluster_id, last(dnodes_total)  - last(dnodes_alive) as dnode_offline  from log.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= (now -30s) and _ts < now partition by cluster_id having first(_ts) > 0

alert.message: There are vnodes offline in the cluster
alert.name: VNodes Offline alert

targets.sql: select now(), cluster_id, last(vnodes_total)  - last(vnodes_alive) as vnode_offline  from log.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= (now - 30s) and _ts < now partition by cluster_id having first(_ts) > 0
select now(), cluster_id, last(grants_expire_time) / 86400 as expire_time from log.taosd_cluster_info where  _ts >= (now - 24h)  and _ts < now  partition by cluster_id having first(_ts) > 0
select now(), dnode_id, last(cpu_system) as cpu_use from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= (now- 5m) and _ts < now partition by dnode_id

select now(), dnode_id, data_dir_level, data_dir_name, last(used)  / last(total)  * 100 as used from log.taosd_dnodes_data_dirs where _ts >= (now - 5m) and _ts < now partition by dnode_id, data_dir_level, data_dir_name
select now(), dnode_id, last(mem_engine) / last(mem_total)  * 100 as taosd from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= (now- 5m) and _ts <now partition by dnode_id

select now(), cluster_id, CASE WHEN max(grants_timeseries_total) > 0.0 THEN max(grants_timeseries_used) / max(grants_timeseries_total) * 100.0 ELSE 0.0 END AS result from log.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= (now - 30s) and _ts < now partition by cluster_id having timetruncate(first(_ts), 1m) > 0

alert.message: The number of query requests exceeds 100 times within one minute
alert.name: Query Count Alert

targets.sql: select now() as ts, count(*) as slow_count from performance_schema.perf_queries
select now() as ts, count(*) as slow_count from performance_schema.perf_queries where exec_usec>300000000
select now(), dnode_id,  max(uptime) - last(uptime) as dnode_report  from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= (now - 90s) and _ts < now  partition by dnode_id

alert.message: The adapter websocket interface has failed more than 5 times within 30 seconds
alert.name: Adapter Websocket Failed Alert

targets.sql: select now(), sum(`fail`) as `Failed` from log.adapter_requests where req_type=1 and ts >= (now -30s) and ts < now

alert.message: DNodes Metrics reports less than 3 times within 180 seconds
alert.name: DNodes report alert

targets.sql: select now(), cluster_id, count(*) as dnode_report  from log.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= (now -180s) and _ts < now partition by cluster_id having timetruncate(first(_ts), 1h) > 0

alert.message: The adapter restful interface has failed more than 5 times within 30 seconds
alert.name: Adapter RESTful Failed Alert alert

targets.sql: select now(), sum(`fail`) as `Failed` from log.adapter_requests where req_type=0 and ts >= (now -30s) and ts < now;

alert.message: Received data deletion request within 30 seconds
alert.name: Delete Request Alert

targets.sql: select now(), sum(`count`)  as `delete_count`  from log.taos_sql_req  where sql_type = 'delete' and _ts >= (now -30s) and _ts < now

list.definition: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null ORDER BY CASE WHEN name = 'log' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, name;
list.label: Log from
list.name: database
list.query: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null ORDER BY CASE WHEN name = 'log' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, name;

list.definition: select distinct dnode_ep  from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
list.name: fqdn
list.query: select distinct dnode_ep  from $database.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

list.definition: select last(cluster_version) from $database.taosd_cluster_basic where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
list.name: version
list.query: select last(cluster_version) from $database.taosd_cluster_basic where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

list.definition: select last(first_ep) from $database.taosd_cluster_basic where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
list.name: firstEp
list.query: select last(first_ep) from $database.taosd_cluster_basic where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

list.definition: select distinct username  from $database.taos_sql_req where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
list.label: User
list.name: username
list.query: select distinct username  from $database.taos_sql_req where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

list.definition: select distinct result  from $database.taos_sql_req where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
list.label: SqlResult
list.name: sql_result
list.query: select distinct result  from $database.taos_sql_req where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

list.definition: select  distinct endpoint  from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to order by endpoint
list.label: adapter_endpoint
list.name: adapter_endpoint
list.query: select  distinct endpoint  from $database.adapter_requests where ts >= $from and ts <= $to order by endpoint
